# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.1.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| 1.0.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 1.0   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

To report a security vulnerability, please send an email to xad@xcelerit.com,
describing the issue with as much detail as possible.
